DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether sedation affect saccadic eye movement .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , human volunteer , age 1965 . American Society Anesthesiology ( ASA ) class III inclusion criterion Pregnancy Respiratory disease ( severe asthma , emphysema ) Cardiac disease ( coronary artery disease , congestive heart failure ) Symptomatic reflux disease Advanced rheumatic disease involve cervical spine Propofol egg allergy Neurological disease ( stroke , intracranial process ) Severe anemia
